title_teim: The eighteenth annual induction ceremony. 2003. Reel 206.
title_ssm: The eighteenth annual induction ceremony. 2003. Reel 206.
title_si: The eighteenth annual induction ceremony. 2003. Reel 206.
label_teim: Rock & Roll Hall of Fame 2003 Induction Ceremony ISO #6 Reel #206, 3/10/03
label_ssm: Rock & Roll Hall of Fame 2003 Induction Ceremony ISO #6 Reel #206, 3/10/03
summary_teim:
Elvis Costello & the Attractions, Mo Ostin, and the Clash are inducted in the 2003 ceremony. Includes performances by Costello, Paul Simon, and AC/DC.

[Camera angle: house right, crane shots.]
summary_ssm:
Elvis Costello & the Attractions, Mo Ostin, and the Clash are inducted in the 2003 ceremony. Includes performances by Costello, Paul Simon, and AC/DC.

[Camera angle: house right, crane shots.]
contents_teim: Pump it up (Elvis Costello) -- Elton John inducts Elvis Costello & the Attractions -- Elvis Costello accepts his award and introduces the Attractions -- The Attractions accept their award -- Deep dark truthful mirror ; What's so funny about peace love and understanding (Elvis Costello) -- Lorne Michaels and Paul Simon induct Mo Ostin -- Neil Young inducts Mo Ostin -- Mo Ostin accepts his award -- Still crazy after all these years (Paul Simon) -- Tom Morello inducts the Clash -- The Edge inducts the Clash -- The Clash accept their award -- Highway to Hell (AC/DC).
contents_ssm: Pump it up (Elvis Costello) -- Elton John inducts Elvis Costello & the Attractions -- Elvis Costello accepts his award and introduces the Attractions -- The Attractions accept their award -- Deep dark truthful mirror ; What's so funny about peace love and understanding (Elvis Costello) -- Lorne Michaels and Paul Simon induct Mo Ostin -- Neil Young inducts Mo Ostin -- Mo Ostin accepts his award -- Still crazy after all these years (Paul Simon) -- Tom Morello inducts the Clash -- The Edge inducts the Clash -- The Clash accept their award -- Highway to Hell (AC/DC).

abstract_ssm: This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony from March 10, 2003.  Elvis Costello & the Attractions then perform "Pump It Up" -- Elton John induct Elvis Costello & the Attractions -- Elvis Costello & the Attractions acceptance speech -- Elvis Costello & the Attractions perform "Deep Dark Truthful Mirror/You Really Got a Hold on Me" -- Elvis Costello & the Attractions perform "(What's So Funny 'Bout) Peace, Love, and Understanding -- Paul Simon and Lorne Michaels induct Mo Ostin -- Mo Ostin video montage -- Neil Young inducts Mo Ostin -- Mo Ostin acceptance speech -- Paul Simon performs "Still Crazy After All These Years" -- Tom Morello introduces The Clash -- The Clash video montage -- The Edge inducts The Clash -- The Clash acceptance speech -- AC/DC perform "Highway to Hell"
